attributes.action: Charge the CEO's of the failed Banks for Treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For bringing the financial institutions of this country to their knees,and dragging the good name of the U.K's financial stability into the gutter throughout the world.
They did this with knowledge and forethought and full understanding of what they were doing, and purely for personal greed.
They also did it at the same time we are at war in two countries.
"THAT IS TREASON".

rejection.details: The Government does not charge individuals with criminal offences.  That is a matter for the Courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
